entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
